channel.title: ~~! Universal-X is BACK / Hawtypkerz!~~
channel.description:
Enjoy this Oldstyle pking server!
Dedicated server specs: Platform: Fujitsu PRIMERGY MX130 HardDisk = GB 2.1 TB Disk Protection = RAID 10 Network limit = UNLIMITED Network port = 1,000 mbps Ram Memory = 12 GB CPU Cores = AMD Athlon™ II X4, Quad-Core 64 Bit, 4x 2.3 GHz ------------------------------------------- Website: coming soon! Webclient: Coming soon! ------------------------------------------- Server includes:
-Barrows: -Duel Arena: -Fully working godwars: -Pest Control: -Warrior's Guild: -Jad: -Corporal Beast: -All Stryke Works: -Barrelchest Monster: -Tormented Deamons: And alot's of more Monsters.
We also have: -Dragon claws(Fully working spec): -All Godswords:(Fully working spec): -Slayer helmet: -Dragon Armour(Oranamented): -Arcane,Spectral,Elysian,Divine Spirit Shields. -Skillcapes with all the emotes. -Nice community. - Vote for Items. -And alot's of fun. -------------------------------------------------- SKILLS: (All Skillcape Emotes Works.):[/b] -Attack: -Strength: -Defence: -Range: -Prayer:(With Soul Split, And Turmoil + All curses work): -Magic: -Runecrafting: -Agility: -Herblore: -Thieving: -Crafting: -Fletching: -Slayer: -Hunter: -Mining: -Smithing: -Fishing: -Cooking: -Firemaking: -Woodcutting: -And Farming:
Pictures coming quickly im busy with client atm!
admin spots are open! - - - -
Here the client , if u see bugs / glitches pm it!
Enjoy the server lady's!
